                            <div id="page_title">
                                
    <h1 id="page_title_page"
     >
    College of Fine Arts
    </h1>

                            </div>
                            
  <div id="page_image_area"><script type='text/javascript'>insert_vm('/viewxml%2Easpx%3Fid=82793','/images/no_js_u.jpg','The IUP Arch','');</script><noscript><img src='/images/no_js_u.jpg' alt='The IUP Arch' title='' /></noscript></div>

                            <div id="content">
                                
  
	 <div class="column1">
	 
	       
	    <div id="ctl00_cpContent_mainContentBlock">
	<p class="introduction">With state-of-the-art facilities, the College of Fine Arts hosts a talented faculty and staff dedicated to expanding the minds and skills of students. We offer a balance of high professional standards and rigorous, current educational practice, and an emphasis—on stage, in the studio, and in class—on a culturally and ethnically diverse world of art. That is what students can expect from the College of Fine Arts at IUP.</p>
<img title="Front of Fisher Auditorium" height="176" alt="Front of Fisher Auditorium" src="/uploadedImages/Academics/Colleges/colleges.jpg" width="260" /><p>In addition to the IUP Performing Arts Center, opened in September 2008, the College of Fine Arts maintains Waller Hall, a state-of-the-art theater facility housing two performance spaces, offices, classrooms, and technical studios. Home to the <a title="Theater and Dance" href="/WorkArea/linkit.aspx?LinkIdentifier=id&amp;ItemID=5087">Department of Theater and Dance</a>, the department also maintains a dance performance theater in Zink Hall. <a title="Fisher Auditorium" href="/WorkArea/linkit.aspx?LinkIdentifier=id&amp;ItemID=81545">Fisher Auditorium</a>, connected to Waller Hall via the new Performing Arts Center, maintains an art-deco style historic theater seating 1,460, plus dressing rooms, rehearsal space, offices, and full technical facilities.</p>
<p>Sprowls Hall is home to the <a title="Art" href="/WorkArea/linkit.aspx?LinkIdentifier=id&amp;ItemID=5635">Art Department</a> and contains a variety of offices, galleries, and studios, including the IUP Center for Turning and Furniture Design. Large, modern studios for ceramics and sculpture for art students are located in the Robertshaw Building. Cogswell Hall houses the <a title="Music" href="/WorkArea/linkit.aspx?LinkIdentifier=id&amp;ItemID=7063">Music Department</a>, having gone through a complete renovation and major addition in 2007. The building boasts a large music library, state-of-the-art classrooms, ample practice rooms, large ensemble rehearsal halls, and numerous studio and specialized classroom spaces. All departments are fully accredited, and IUP is has the distinction of being an All-Steinway School.</p>
<p><a href="http://www.facebook.com/pages/The-Lively-Arts-at-IUP/65588079247?ref=mf"><img class="left-aligned-image" title="Facebook 50" height="54" alt="Facebook 50" src="/uploadedImages/Units/F/Fine_Arts/Lively_Arts/fb_logo_50.jpg" width="50" border="0" /></a><a href="http://twitter.com/iuplivelyarts"><img class="left-aligned-image" title="Twitter 50 logo" height="50" alt="Twitter 50 logo" src="/uploadedImages/Units/F/Fine_Arts/Lively_Arts/twitter_50.jpg" width="50" border="0" /></a></p>
</div>
        
	    
	</div>
    <div class="column2">
    
		
	    
        <div>
	<div class="span-6 normal zone"><div class="style0 zone-inner"><div><a class="rollover" style="background-image: url(/uploadedImages/Units/U_-_V/Videographer/Library/Hawks_Talk/HawksTalk-Rollover-271.jpg); width: 271px; height: 100px; " href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uriabMq9vt4&amp;feature=share&amp;list=EC235FC2BDB5314D0F">Hawks Talk</a></div></div></div>
</div>
		<div id="ctl00_cpContent_collectionBlock" class="collectionWrapper">
	<dl><dt><a href="/finearts/departments/default.aspx">Departments</a></dt><dd>Academic departments of the College of Fine Arts include <a href="/WorkArea/linkit.aspx?LinkIdentifier=id&amp;ItemID=5635" title="Art">Art,</a> <a href="/WorkArea/linkit.aspx?LinkIdentifier=id&amp;ItemID=7063" title="Music">Music,</a> and <a href="/WorkArea/linkit.aspx?LinkIdentifier=id&amp;ItemID=5087" title="Theater and Dance">Theater and Dance.</a> </dd><dt><a href="/livelyarts/default.aspx">Lively Arts</a></dt><dd>Performing and visual arts events are presented by the departments of <a href="/WorkArea/linkit.aspx?LinkIdentifier=id&amp;ItemID=7063" title="Music">Music</a>, <a href="/WorkArea/linkit.aspx?LinkIdentifier=id&amp;ItemID=5635" title="Art">Art</a>, and <a href="/WorkArea/linkit.aspx?LinkIdentifier=id&amp;ItemID=5087" title="Theater and Dance">Theater and Dance</a> along with the <a href="/WorkArea/linkit.aspx?LinkIdentifier=id&amp;ItemID=22303" title="University Museum">University Museum</a> and <a href="http://www.arts.iup.edu/kipp/" title="">Kipp Gallery</a>.</dd><dt><a href="/artspath/default.aspx">ArtsPath</a></dt><dd>ArtsPath is an arts-in-education program in partnership with the Pennsylvania Council on the Arts.</dd><dt><a href="/WorkArea/DownloadAsset.aspx?id=83440" title="Downloadable Document">Fine Arts Annual Report</a> <a href="/WorkArea/DownloadAsset.aspx?id=83440"><img src="/images/icon-download-document-13.png" alt="Document icon" title="Downloadable Document" height="13" width="11" border="0" /></a></dt><dd>We invite you to download a copy (pdf) of the 2010-11 annual report for the College of Fine Arts.</dd></dl><div class="clearer"> </div>
</div>
